Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A man who, at the king's insistence, is trying to help Prince Charming find a bride. While fiercely loyal, he tends to be a bit scatterbrained.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Grumpy (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of seven dwarfs who live in a cottage deep in the woods. Grumpy is suspicious of everything and slow to trust anyone, and always wears a look of displeasure.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Grumpy (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of seven dwarfs who live with Snow White. At first, Grumpy had nothing pleasant to say about her, but her kindness warmed his heart over time.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Hades
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: God of the Underworld. He is scheming to overthrow Zeus, ruler of Olympus, and take over the world. Hades would like nothing better than to find a powerful mortal he can fast-talk into helping him achieve his ambitions.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Happy
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of seven dwarfs who live in a cottage deep in the woods. Happy's constant smiles are a comfort to all around him.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Hercules
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy with tremendous strength who goes by "Herc" for short. He was born a god, but someone kidnapped him when he was a baby, and ever since he has lived down on earth as a mortal. After learning he can rejoin the gods on Olympus if he becomes a true hero, he asked Phil to train him, and has been hard at work ever since.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Horace Horsecollar
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The fellow in charge of Fruitball. His job has gotten a lot harder since the Unversed showed up. He was a local fixture before Disney Castle was even built, and has known King Mickey and Queen Minnie for ages.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Huey
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of Donald's triplet nephews. He calls the shots at the ice cream shop he runs with Dewey and Louie. They're trying to save up for a big adventure. Step one: thinking up hit ice cream flavors no one's ever tasted before!

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Ice Colossus
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A fake Ice Titan which Hades created to do battle in the Coliseum.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Ienzo
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A young boy who speaks little - but his serene gaze suggests he sees much. Even and the others at the castle are raising him since he has lost his parents.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Isa
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A serene and self-possessed boy who always has time for a quick quip at his best friend Lea's expense.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Jaq (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A personable mouse who looks after people and knows how to get things done. His friend Cinderella often saves him from the clutches of Lucifer the cat. Ventus helped Jaq make a dress for Cinderella to wear to the ball.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Jaq (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A personable mouse who looks after people and knows how to get things done. His friend Cinderella often saves him from the clutches of Lucifer the cat. His heroic efforts helped free Cinderella after Lady Tremaine locked her in the attic.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Kairi
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A girl with the mysterious ability to drive the Unversed away. Her heart is pure light.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Kairi's Grandma
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A loving grandmother. Kairi could listen to her story about the light a hundred times and never get bored.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Lady Tremaine
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: Cinderella's wicked stepmother, who forces her to live in the attic and finish unreasonable amounts of chores each day. She herself lives in luxury and spoils her own daughters, Drizella and Anastasia, rotten.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Lea
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A likable, upbeat boy who tends to jump into things without consulting anybody else-sometimes with disastrous results. He seems to be hung up on other people remembering him, and taught Ventus the importance of making friends. He and his own best friend, Isa, have bigger plans.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Louie
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of Donald's triplet nephews. He helps out in his own easygoing way at the ice cream shop. They're trying to save up for a big adventure.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Lucifer
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: Lady Tremaine's bully of a cat. He is constantly tormenting Jaq.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Maleficent
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A terrifying evil fairy with a command of dark magic. She attended the celebration of Aurora's birth, despite not being invited, and prophesied that 16 years later, Aurora would prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel and die. Maleficent's gleeful account of Terra's misdeeds has left Ven troubled.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Maleficent (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A terrifying evil fairy with a command of dark magic. She attended the celebration of Aurora's birth, despite not being invited, and prophesied that 16 years later, Aurora would prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel and die. From Master Xehanort she learned about the existence of other worlds, and that she could rule them all by gathering seven hearts of pure light.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Masked Boy (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious figure with ties to Master Xehanort. He warned Ventus that Terra was in some kind of danger, but disappeared before explaining any further.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Masked Boy
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious figure with ties to Master Xehanort.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Master Eraqus (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the true Keyblade Masters and also Terra, Aqua and Ventus's teacher. He has a strong aversion to darkness, and believes it the duty of every Keyblade Master to rid the world of it.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Master Eraqus
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the true Keyblade Masters and also Terra, Aqua and Ventus's teacher. He has a strong aversion to darkness, and believes it the duty of every Keyblade Master to rid the world of it. Though strict on the outside, he is not unkind, and loves his pupils like his own children.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Master Xehanort
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the true Keyblade Masters and a longtime acquaintance of Master Eraqus. He is connected with the masked boy, and harbors a hidden agenda.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Master Xehanort (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the true Keyblade Masters and a longtime acquaintance of Master Eraqus. He is connected with the masked boy, and harbors a hidden agenda. Unlike Master Eraqus, Xehanort believes darkness need not be rejected if it can be controlled.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Merlin
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A great wizard who travels the world with a mysterious bag. He instantly recognized Ventus as a fellow "world" traveler, and allowed him access to a curious book.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Merlin (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A great wizard who travels the world with a mysterious bag. He is holding on to a curious book which Terra found.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Merryweather
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The fairy dressed in blue. She can be stubborn at times, and often bickers with Flora. Merryweather gave the newborn Aurora a ray of hope as her gift. To keep her safe from Maleficent, the three fairies lived with the princess in a cottage in the forest for 16 years.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: King Mickey
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: King of Disney Castle. He put aside his training under Yen Sid and ran off when he heard the worlds were in trouble.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: King Mickey (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: King of Disney Castle. He put aside his training under Yen Sid and ran off when he heard the worlds were in trouble. So far his travels from world to world have been mostly accidental, since he cannot control the Star Shard he "borrowed."

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Queen Minnie
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: Queen of Disney Castle, who reigns over the kingdom while King Mickey is away training. Right now, she is busy putting together the annual Disney Town Dream Festival, but Pete's hijinks aren't making the job any easier.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Monstro
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A whale monster that lives in the star ocean.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Mr. Smee
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A pirate in the service of Captain Hook. Blunderer and blockhead he may be, but Smee never abandons his captain.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: No Heart
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A suit of armor worn by one who wields a Keyblade. No one knows who's behind the mask.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Old Peddler Woman (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious old woman who dropped an apple. She claimed Terra threatened her with the Keyblade to find out about Master Xehanort - a troubling thought for Ventus.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Captain Dark
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A "secret" identity assumed by Pete, Disney Town's biggest troublemaker. He is pretending to be a shadowy hero to garner votes and win the Million Dreams Award prize. Unfortunately, he's more shady than shadowy, and there's nothing heroic about him.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Captain Justice
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: Pete - Disney Town's biggest trouble maker - in disguise. The truth-and-justice shtick is just a ploy to garner votes and win him the Million Dreams Award prize. Sadly, this particular "hero" is better known for his deeds of derring-don't.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Peter Pan (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy from Never Land, where no one ever has to grow up. Peter may hatch plans faster than he can stick to them, but he lacks nothing for courage and a sense of what's right. After trying to nab his nemesis Captain Hook's pirate treasure and coming up empty-handed, he and the Lost Boys decided to fill the chest with their own treasures instead.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Peter Pan (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy from Never Land, where no one ever has to grow up. Peter may hatch plans faster than he can stick to them, but he lacks nothing for courage and a sense of what's right. Captain Hook tricked Terra into fighting him, but the misunderstanding was soon cleared up, and Peter flew off to save Tinker Bell.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Peter Pan (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy from Never Land, where no one ever has to grow up. Peter may hatch plans faster than he can stick to them, but he lacks nothing for courage and a sense of what's right. To help Slightly and Cubby find courage, he drew a treasure map and sent them out on an "expatition."

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Philoctetes
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A renowned trainer of heroes who has whipped countless of hopefuls into shape. For a while, he had written off the whole hero business, but Hercules talked him out of retirement.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Pluto
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: King Mickey's trusty dog. While the King is away, Pluto helps Queen Minnie and Daisy hold down the fort. Well, at least he thinks he's helping.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Prince
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The prince of a neighboring kingdom who met Snow White one day after her beautiful singing drew him into the castle. Unable to forget her, he returned to the castle later, only to learn she had taken a bite from a poisonous apple and fallen into a deep sleep. With love's first kiss, however, he was able to wake her.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Prince Charming
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The prince of this kingdom, who fell in love with a girl he met at the ball.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Prince Charming (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The prince of this kingdom, who fell in love with a girl he met at the ball. He was reunited with his true love when the glass slipper, his only clue to the girl's identity, fit Cinderella perfectly.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Prince Phillip
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: The cheerful and likeable prince of a neighboring kingdom. He met Princess Aurora when she was still living in the forest. Maleficent imprisoned him to prevent his and Aurora's reunion, but the three good fairies rescued him. In the end, he defeated Maleficent in dragon form and, with true love's kiss, woke Aurora from her slumber.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Queen
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A vain woman who is convinced she is the fairest of all. When the Spirit of the Magic Mirror revealed Snow White to be fairer, the Queen decided to take the maiden's life.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Rabbit
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A crabby customer who just wants a quiet life. Somehow, though, the funny business always finds him, leaving his gardens in a terrible state and his precious honey pots drained to the last drop.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree (1966)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Riku (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A little boy who yearns to see the outside world. Terra chose him to inherit the power of the Keyblade. Riku deeply cares for his friend Sora, and believes the strength he needs to protect people awaits him somewhere in the wider world.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Riku (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A little boy who yearns to see the outside world. Aqua could sense he has acquired the power of the Keyblade.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Scrooge McDuck
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: An entrepreneur and shop owner from Disney Town. Hoping to take his already massive fortunes to cosmic levels, he moved to Radiant Garden with Merlin's help. The lifetime passes to Disney Town were a gift from Scrooge.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Scrooge McDuck (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: An entrepreneur and shop owner from Disney Town. Hoping to take his already massive fortunes to cosmic levels, he moved to Radiant Garden with Merlin's help. Scrooge and Aqua got their wires crossed when she asked for help. She was looking for Terra, but he assumed she meant Ventus and sent her in the wrong direction.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Sleepy
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of seven dwarfs who live in a cottage deep in the woods. Sleepy always looks ready to doze off.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Slightly (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the Lost Boys who live in Peter Pan's hideout. He and Cubby were helping Tinker Bell look for a shooting star, but Peter talked them into going after Captain Hook's treasure instead.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Slightly (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the Lost Boys who live in Peter Pan's hideout. He, Peter, and Cubby were hoping to swipe Captain Hook's treasure.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Slightly (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of the Lost Boys who live in Peter Pan's hideout. Together, they went on an "expatition" to find the treasure marked on Peter's map.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Sneezy
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of seven dwarfs who live in a cottage deep in the woods. Sneezy... Well, he sneezes a lot.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Snow White (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A lovely young maiden with a kind heart. So beautiful was Snow White that the Queen grew jealous and sought to end her life. Snow White was spared, however, and began living in a cottage deep in the woods with seven dwarfs she met.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Snow White (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A lovely young maiden with a kind heart. So beautiful was Snow White that the Queen grew jealous and sought to end her life. When brought together, seven hearts of pure light like Snow White's are the key to ruling all worlds.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Snow White (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A lovely young maiden with a kind heart. So beautiful was Snow White that the Queen grew jealous and gave her a poisoned apple. Snow White fell into a deep sleep, but was woken by a kiss from her beloved Prince.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Sora
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A cheerful, energetic little boy. He and his friend Riku always play together out on the island.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Spirit of the Magic Mirror
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A spirit who appears within the magic mirror at the queen's behest and answers all questions with the truth.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Terra
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A young man in training to become a Keyblade Master. He and his fellow pupils Aqua and Ventus share a healthy rivalry and strong bond of friendship.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Terra (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A young man in training to become a Keyblade Master. He and his fellow pupils Aqua and Ventus share a healthy rivalry and strong bond of friendship. Though he is aware of the darkness in his heart, Terra refuses to accept it - and Master Xehanort's suggestions that it might be controlled have only deepened his quandary.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Tigger
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A friend of Pooh's who loves bouncing more than anything else. Unfortunately, his bouncing sometimes causes headaches for everybody else.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree (1966)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Tinker Bell (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A pixie who lives in Never Land. Ventus kept her company after she and Peter Pan had a fight, but then Captain Hook kidnapped her.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Tinker Bell (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A pixie who lives in Never Land. Terra saved her from the clutches of Captain Hook.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Tinker Bell (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A pixie who lives in Never Land. She gets very jealous when other girls are around Peter Pan.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Vanitas (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious boy who hides his face behind a mask. He has ties to Master Xehanort. Vanitas warned Ventus that Terra was in some kind of danger, but disappeared before explaining any further.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Vanitas
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious boy who hides his face behind a mask. He has ties to Master Xehanort.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Vanitas Remnant
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A physical manifestation of what remained of Vanitas's powerful thoughts and feelings.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Ventus (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of Master Eraqus's pupils. He usually goes by "Ven" for short. He and Terra and Aqua train together, sharing both a healthy rivalry and a strong bond of friendship. Haunted by the masked boy's warnings about Terra, Ven defied Master Eraqus, ran away from home, and set off for the outside world to find his friend.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Ventus
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: One of Master Eraqus's pupils. He usually goes by "Ven" for short. He and Terra and Aqua train together, sharing both a healthy rivalry and a strong bond of friendship. Since Ventus is younger, Terra and Aqua tend to be very protective of him.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Winnie the Pooh
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A bear who lives in the Hundred-Acre Wood. Easygoing he may be, but when it comes to honey - his favorite - he tends to get just a little carried away.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree (1966)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: The Witch
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A form the Queen assumed by drinking a potion. Jealous of Snow White's beauty, she wished to deceive the maiden into eating a poisonous apple. She succeeded in putting Snow White into a deep sleep, but the dwarfs chased her down, and she was never seen again.
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.AdditionalInformation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Yen Sid (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A great sorcerer who dwells within the Mysterious Tower. Mickey is his apprentice. Yen Sid was the first to detect something amiss with the worlds, and alerted Master Eraqus as soon as he could. He is concerned about his apprentice, Mickey, who has run off.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Yen Sid (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A great sorcerer who dwells within the Mysterious Tower. Mickey is his apprentice. Yen Sid was the first to detect something amiss with the worlds, and alerted Master Eraqus as soon as he could.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Yen Sid (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A great sorcerer who dwells within the Mysterious Tower. Mickey is his apprentice. Yen Sid was the first to detect something amiss with the worlds, and alerted Master Eraqus as soon as he could. It was also he who delivered to Aqua the news of Master Eraqus's demise at the hands of Terra and Master Xehanort.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Unknown
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A mysterious figure whose origins, identity, and purpose are unclear.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Zack (V)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy who longs to become a hero. He heard that Phil specialized in training heroes, and competed to become his next student, but Hercules ended up edging him out. Nothing fazes Zack, who smiles his way through the worst of troubles.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Zack (T)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy who longs to become a hero. Hades manipulated him and turned him into a warrior of darkness, but Zack's heart was freed when Terra defeated him.

Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Title: Zack (A)
Kingdom Hearts Birth By Sleep.Description: A boy who longs to become a hero. Hades manipulated him and turned him into a warrior of darkness, but Zack's heart was freed when Terra defeated him. Now, he looks up to Terra as a hero.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Aladdin
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A young man who lives in the desert city of Agrabah and dreams of the day he can be with Princess Jasmine. But Aladdin proved to be an obstacle to Jafar's evil plans, and was banished to the desert. There, through a truly wild stroke of luck, he happened upon the Cave of Wonders, obtained the magic lamp, and became the Genie's new master.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Alice
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A girl who wandered into Wonderland quite by accident. Perhaps her curiosity was to blame, but then how can one not admire Alice's unyielding spirit when faced with such overwhelming oddness? The bugs in the datascape scrambled her memory and left her scratching her head, but in the end, she and Sora managed to set everything right.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Card Soldier
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: Soldiers in the service of Wonderland's ruler, the Queen of Hearts. Seeing as they are quite fond of keeping their heads attached to their shoulders, they make a point not to defy her.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Cerberus
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The ultimate guard dog: enormous, three-headed, armed to the teeth (with teeth), and loyal to its master, Hades. Be ready to block quickly and often if you don't want this Stygian pooch to turn you into dental floss.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: The Cheshire Cat
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A strange feline from Wonderland whose unnerving grin and absurd interjections leave even the best conversationalist struggling to keep up. As if that weren't maddening enough, the Cheshire Cat tends to vanish into thin air almost as suddenly as he pops out of it.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Chip
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: One of the engineers working at Disney Castle. Dale is his little brother. On Sora's previous journeys, they were in charge of the Gummi Ship, a flying machine which allowed Sora and friends to freely travel between worlds. He and Dale look a lot alike, but you can tell the pair apart by their nose colors and the shape of their front teeth.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Cid
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A man with a gift for technology who's as good a pilot as he is an engineer. Once, Cid called another world home. Just before that world was lost to darkness, he gathered up what children he could save, and together, they fled to Traverse Town.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Cloud
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A buster sword-wielding soldier whose past failures continue to weigh on him. Believing himself weak, Cloud sought out the secrets of a hero's strength, as well as the secrets darkness might hold. Hades tried to use these desires against him, but once Cloud realized he was being manipulated, he wisely joined forces with Sora and Hercules.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Dale
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: One of the engineers working at Disney castle. Chip is his older brother. They are superb technicians, and now they have put on their system admin hats to digitize the journal and find out what's happening inside. He and Chip are sometimes hard to tell apart, but their nose colors and the shape of their front teeth are a dead giveaway.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Data-Riku
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: An entity that looks just like Sora's friend Riku. He is, however, not the real deal. Data-Riku was chosen as a sort of ark to keep all the collective data within Jiminy's journal safe from bugs; in a way, he IS the journal now. But even he could not explain the cause of the bugs, so, after adopting Riku's appearance, he "imported" Mickey and friends to help solve the mystery.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Data-Roxas
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A boy who used cards to guide Sora in the datascape version of Castle Oblivion. While he bears an uncanny resemblance to another boy deeply connected to Sora, it is more than coat and hood that prevent Sora from seeing. Was this boy just a phantom, a glitch? Or does this data tie into hurtful memories that sleep within Sora's heart?

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Dewey
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: One of Donald's three nephews. Can't pick Dewey out of the crowd? He's the one in the blue clothes. Dewey is the brains of the bunch, so even though he doesn't always mind Cid, he knows an opportunity to learn when he sees one.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Donald Duck
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A magician in the service of King Mickey. While full of vim and vigor, his short temper sometimes gets him into hot water. Donald met the real Sora while on a journey to find Mickey; during the course of their travels they became fast friends. After reuniting with Mickey and fighting off the hordes of darkness, Donald returned to Disney Castle to enjoy a bit of peace.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Dragon Maleficent
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: Maleficent's dragon form, a staggering demonstration of the powers of evil. Sora had to face this mighty adversary while trying to save Data-Riku from the bugs corrupting him.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Genie
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A bubbly, blue, boisterous character who lives inside the magic lamp. He has great power and will grant just three wishes to each of his masters. But not all masters have good intentions, and as for Genie's own wish - well, those he cannot make come true. In the datascape, Genie met Aladdin after the boy was banished to the desert by Jafar, and they became fast friends.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Goofy
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The laid-back captain of King Mickey's royal knights. While a bit of a softy, Goofy lacks nothing for courage. He and Donald met the real Sora after leaving Disney Castle to search for Mickey, who had gone missing. Together, they overcame countless dangers and forged a one-of-a-kind friendship.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Hades
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The God of the Underworld, a former (and still aspiring!) world conqueror who would like nothing more than to see Hercules wiped off the face of the planet. With the Coliseum a tangle of bugs and Cloud a tangle of emotional issues, he ought to have found a way, but Sora showed up just in time to show HIM up, and prove once again that sliminess doesn't pay.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Hercules
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A hero whose kind heart and bursting-at-the-seams biceps have won him the admiration of the Olympus Coliseum crowds. Despite being the son of a god, he lives down on earth as a mortal. Hercules was already inside the Coliseum investigating when Sora showed up. Later, the two joined forces and, together, got to the bottom of the bugs.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Huey
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: One of Donald's three nephews. Can't tell Huey apart from the others? Just look for the red clothes. He thinks it's his job to keep Dewey and Louie in line, but in Traverse Town, it's really Cid who looks after all three of them.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Iago
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: Jafar's henchman, a cunning parrot who doesn't know when to shut up. With Jafar plotting to take over Agrabah, Iago must have been busy flying around the city and making trouble.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Jafar
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A wizard who served as royal vizier in Agrabah's palace. The bugs plaguing the datascape version of Agrabah provided Jafar with just the tool he needed to seize the throne: a fake lamp Pete created from data. Later, Jafar used the real lamp, stolen from Aladdin, to become an all-powerful genie. In the end, though, he was imprisoned within yet another lamp: his own.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Genie Jafar
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: Jafar, after using Pete's fake lamp to transform. The beams he shoots will afflict you with Slow, but you can turn the tables; block the beams and bounce them toward Iago to slow the bird down and create an opportunity to strike.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Jasmine
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A young woman from the desert city of Agrabah who just happens to be its princess. Stifled by palace life, she was drawn toward the freedom of the streets and a young man named Aladdin. Jafar, newly empowered by the bugs, had designs on Jasmine, but Sora saved her from her plight.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Jiminy Cricket
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The cricket in charge of jotting down everything that goes on in Disney Castle. He also joined Sora on his adventures and kept a record of them in two journals. One of those books was almost completely erased (it's a long story). And when a mysterious message appeared in that same book, out of nowhere... Well, that's how this latest adventure began.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Kairi
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A girl born in Radiant Garden. Life carried her to the Destiny Islands, where she met Sora and Riku. Kairi is a princess of heart, and the forces of darkness tried to bend the pure light within her to sinister purposes; for a long time, she and Sora and Riku were separated. After a long journey, though, they were brought back together, their lives at last normal again.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Leon
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A swordsman from Radiant Garden. When he was still a boy, his home was lost to darkness, and he was forced to flee with Cid and the other children to Traverse Town. He no longer uses his real name, a symbolic farewell to the little boy who was not strong enough. Later, Leon would fight against the forces of darkness more than once, but thanks to Sora, he can now focus on rebuilding his home.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Louie
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: One of Donald's three nephews. Not sure which one is Louie? Keep an eye out for the green clothes. Louie is the most laid back of the three - but if you ask Cid, who looks after them, that's not saying much.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Maleficent
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A terrifying evil fairy who commands dark magic. On one of Sora's previous adventures, Maleficent led the hordes of darkness in an attempt to conquer all worlds. It was her servant, Pete, who led her to this strange new world; while unaware of its true nature, she can see the potential it holds for steeping other worlds in darkness.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Mickey Mouse
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The king of Disney Castle. Just like Sora, he wields a Keyblade. In the past, he traveled from world to world to watch over Sora, Donald, and the others, and guide them in their journey to save all worlds from the forces of darkness. Once the crisis was averted, Mickey returned to Disney Castle to live a peaceful life with his friends there.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Naminé
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A special Nobody whose counterpart is Kairi. Organization XIII exploited Naminé's unique powers to alter Sora's memory, but his true heart moved her to betray them. For Sora's memory to be repaired, he had to enter a long sleep. During this time, Naminé found hurtful memories hiding deep in his heart. Hoping their story might come to light, she added a message to Jiminy's journal.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Pete
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A troublemaker who once lived in the same world as King Mickey, Donald, and friends. But after mouthing off and getting temporarily banished, Pete was approached by Maleficent and became her loyal servant. The datascape isn't the first place he has meddled with, but now that he's wandered in, he is hoping this will be his ticket to ruling a world or two.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Philoctetes
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A world-renowned trainer who runs the show in Olympus Coliseum. He's trained a whole slew of heroes in his time ("a lot of yusses") with Hercules being his most recent protégé. After the bugs transformed the Coliseum into a strange labyrinth, Phil had to turn to Sora for help sorting the mess out.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Queen of Hearts
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: The ungenerous ruler of Wonderland who has a whole army of card soldiers at her command. Rub her the wrong way, and it is off with your head. If you're lucky, you might be granted a trial (preferably beforehand). After the bugs caused her memory to fail her, the Queen quickly decided Sora and Alice were to blame.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Riku
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: Sora's best friend. They grew up together on the Destiny Islands. But Riku was so desperate to leave their small, stifling home that he succumbed to the darkness. Eventually, he and Sora clashed. Fortunately, he met Mickey. With his new friend's help, Riku learned to turn his wrongs into rights, and eventually became one of Sora's greatest, unseen allies.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Selphie
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A girl from the Destiny Islands, and a friend of Sora's. Selphie isn't one to sit still; usually she's hanging out with Sora and Wakka and the other island boys. She might look like Ms. Independent and rely a bit too heavily on her fists, but don't be fooled; what you've got here is a classic closet romantic.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Sora
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A boy chosen by a strange sword called a "Keyblade". After his island home was lost to the darkness, he joined forces with Donald, Goofy, and Mickey and saved all worlds. All these adventures were carefully recorded in Jiminy's Journals. Inside the datascape generated within the computer, a digital version of the real Sora (Data-Sora) quests in our hero's stead.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Tidus
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A confident, athletic boy who lives on the Destiny Islands like Sora. He's almost always in good spirits; trying to bring Tidus down is like trying to fall up.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Wakka
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A boy from the Destiny Islands, just like Sora. He's the oldest kid in the bunch, but doesn't throw his weight around; when his bruddas (or sista) need something, he's there to make sure they're taken care of.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: White Rabbit
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A retainer in the service of Wonderland's ruler, the Queen of Hearts. The bugs in the datascape messed with the White Rabbit's memories but, lucky for him, he at least had the good sense to remember the Queen was no one to trifle with.

Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Title: Yuffie
Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.Description: A ninja girl who hails from Radiant Garden. Her home was beset by darkness when she was still very little, and she had to flee with Cid to Traverse Town. But someone as cheerful as Yuffie would never let this show. After meeting Sora in Traverse Town, she fought bravely alongside him against the darkness, and now she is back in Radiant Garden, hard at work rebuilding.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Aeleus
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Lexaeus, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. At one time, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and helped guard the castle. He has awoken in Radiant Garden.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Robed Figure
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A mysterious man whose identity is masked by a brown robe. Sora encountered him in the Destiny Islands right before his first journey began. Riku has seen him as well, though neither of them ever found out for certain who he was.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Ansem
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: He tried to open the door to Kingdom Hearts, but fell to Sora in the end. Once again, Riku finds himself face-to-face with his nemesis.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Anti Black Coat
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A mysterious menace clad in a black coat. He can teleport and attack from all ranges to get the drop on you. Don't be too tenacious: just look for an opening and strike when you can.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Aqua
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three Keyblade wielders who played a pivotal role in a historic clash more than a dozen years ago. To save a friend, she cast herself into the realm of darkness, never to be seen again.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Armored Ventus Nightmare
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The armored form of someone who wished to protect Sora as darkness closed in. But the armor itself was also mantled in darkness, and posed a serious threat to Riku.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Axel
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of Organization XIII's more unique personalities. He was especially close to Roxas, another of their members. Axel expired while fighting to save Sora—or perhaps someone else.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Beagle Boys
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Three rascals who work for Captain Pete. Unfortunately for their boss, they botch one job after another.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Beat
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A boy who has been forced into the Reapers' Game. You won't meet a sweeter guy than Beat, and he seems desperate to keep people from finding out. He picked a fight with Joshua to protect his Game partner.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Black Guard
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Programs that have been repurposed to protect CLU.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Blue Fairy
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The fairy who gave life to Pinocchio and appointed Jiminy his conscience.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Braig
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Xigbar, one of Organization XIII's members. He became a Nobody during a certain experiment.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Chernabog
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A giant demon that emerged from the depths of the earth in a fiery eruption.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Claude Frollo
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A wicked man charged with keeping order in the city. He had no choice but to take Quasimodo in as an infant, but kept him locked in the cathedral bell tower. Frollo hates the very sight of gypsies, whom he believes are the root of all evil in the city.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: CLU
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A program Flynn made to look just like him. His original purpose was to help expand the Grid, but the emergence of the ISOs provoked him to usurp control.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Dilan
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Xaldin, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. In an earlier time, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and helped guard the castle. He has awoken in Radiant Garden, but his condition remains unstable.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Donald Duck
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: King Mickey's court magician and a loyal friend. Donald has journeyed with Sora many times to save the worlds. He is with the king and Goofy, keeping an eye on Sora and Riku as they take the Mark of Mastery exam.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Musketeer Donald
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: An overnight Musketeer and good friends with Mickey and Goofy. Donald was a chicken, but his adventures with Mickey and the others gave him the courage to become a Musketeer in heart and in name.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Enchanted Brooms
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Brooms brought to life by magic. Mickey created them to fetch water so he wouldn't have to.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Esmeralda
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A gypsy woman who loves freedom. She was pursued relentlessly by Frollo, but Quasimodo saved her from the fires.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Even
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Vexen, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. In his previous life, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and researched the mysteries of the heart. He has awoken in Radiant Garden, but his condition remains unstable.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Geppetto
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Pinocchio's father. He went out to sea to find his son but was swallowed, boat and all, by Monstro the whale. Inside Monstro he was reunited with Pinocchio, and they all made it out safely.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Goofy
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The captain of King Mickey's royal knights and also his good friend. Goofy has stuck by Sora's side through more than one adventure. Right now he, the king, and Donald are keeping an eye on Sora and Riku as they take the Mark of Mastery exam.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Musketeer Goofy
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: An overnight Musketeer and good friends with Mickey and Donald. Goofy may not always be on the ball, but he grew alongside Mickey and the others and earned his Musketeer status.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Hugo
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three cathedral gargoyles who can only be heard by Quasimodo, Sora and Riku. Hugo is the wise guy of the bunch, and quick to pick a fight.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Ienzo
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Zexion, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. He used to be one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and researched the mysteries of the heart. He has awoken in Radiant Garden.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Jiminy Cricket
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A faithful friend whom the Blue Fairy has appointed Pinocchio's conscience.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Joshua
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A boy who watches over the Players in the Game. He summoned Traverse Town to save Neku and the others before their existences could blink out.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Kevin Flynn
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Sam's father, Kevin Flynn. Twenty years ago he was trapped inside the Grid. His disc is the key to reopening the Portal back to the real world.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Laverne
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three cathedral gargoyles who can only be heard by Quasimodo, Sora and Riku. Laverne just wants Quasimodo to be safe and happy.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Lea
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The human form of Axel, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. He has awoken in Radiant Garden.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Maleficent
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: An evil fairy who wishes to see all worlds cast into darkness. She has clashed with more than one Keyblade wielder. This time, she tried to use Minnie as a bartering chip and claim the "data" of all worlds.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Maleficent's Raven
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Maleficent's servant, who brought King Mickey a letter at its mistress's behest.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Master Xehanort
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A former Keyblade Master whose obsession with the Keyblade War led him to give his heart over to darkness. He tried to forge the χ-blade and trigger another Keyblade War, but three young Keyblade wielders put a stop to him. Now, he has revealed his ultimate goal: to create the real Organization XIII and infuse his heart into all its members.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Minnie Mouse
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The queen of Disney Castle. Maleficent and Pete nabbed her while King Mickey was away.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Naminé
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Kairi's Nobody. Organization XIII used her special powers to manipulate Sora's memories, but in the end, Sora saved her. She ceased to exist after reuniting with Kairi.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Neku
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A boy who has been forced into the Reapers' Game. He wouldn't be caught dead without his headphones... and wants nothing more than to shut other people out. But Sora, and his other new friends, may have the power to change him.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Peg Leg Pete
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Captain of the Musketeers. He was after the crown and kidnapped Princess Minnie to get it, but Mickey and the Musketeers put a stop to his schemes.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Pete
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: An incorrigible troublemaker who was plucked out of his "time out" in Disney Town by none other than Maleficent. He has been her somewhat-sidekick ever since.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Phoebus
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Captain of the guard. After meeting Quasimodo and Esmerelda, he began to question and then challenge Judge Frollo's methods.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Pinocchio
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A wooden puppet Geppetto made. The Blue Fairy breathed life into him and appointed Jiminy his conscience. Pinocchio's nose grows every time he lies. But he is trying to be good so he can become a real boy.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Pluto
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Mickey's canine companion, a faithful friend who gives his master courage and cheers him up in hard times.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Princess Minnie
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Princess of this kingdom. After someone tried to do her harm, she demanded protection from the Musketeers and fell hopelessly in love with Mickey, one of the three who took the job.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Quasimodo
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A young man who lives in the bell tower of Notre Dame Cathedral. His master, Judge Frollo, has forbidden him from setting foot outside, but a woman named Esmerelda changed him and gave him the strength to see what's out there.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Quorra
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: The last of the ISOs, a new life form that manifested in the digital realm. She has always stuck by Flynn.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Rhyme
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A girl who has been forced into the Reapers' Game. She has lost her memory but doesn't seem too worked up about it. She serves as Joshua's "Portal."

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Riku
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A boy who wields a Keyblade. His battles to save the worlds have often pitted him against the darkness in his own heart. Now, he is braving the Mark of Mastery examination to find out if he is still worthy of the Keyblade.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Rinzler
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A hostile program formerly known as Tron. CLU wiped Tron's memory when he changed his code.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Roxas
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of Organization XIII's members, and also Sora's Nobody. He was especially close to Axel, another of their members. Roxas ceased to exist after reuniting with Sora.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Saïx
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of Organization XIII's members. He expired after an epic clash with Sora. In his human years, he was named Isa and was Lea's close friend.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Sam Flynn
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Kevin Flynn's son. A message, supposedly from his father, led him into the Grid, where the two were reunited for the first time in twenty years.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Shiki
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A girl who has been forced into the Reapers' Game. Her constant companion is a stuffed animal named Mr. Mew. A stranger in a black coat tricked her into leading Riku into a trap.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Sora
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A boy who wields a Keyblade. He has used its power to save the worlds from crisis more than once. Now, he has agreed to take the Mark of Mastery examination in order to retrieve a new power.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Terra
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three Keyblade wielders who played a pivotal role in a historic clash more than a dozen years ago. Master Xehanort possessed his body, and although Aqua saved him, his heart may never find its way back where it belongs.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Ventus
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three Keyblade wielders who played a pivotal role in a historic clash more than a dozen years ago. His heart is sleeping, and he has been laid to rest in a secret chamber of a certain castle until someone can wake him up.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Victor
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of three cathedral gargoyles who can only be heard by Quasimodo, Sora and Riku. Victor is the deep thinker of the bunch, and doesn't know what to do with Hugo.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Xemnas
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Xehanort's Nobody, who was once leader of Organization XIII. He tried to create Kingdom Hearts from the hearts of people, but Sora put an end to his plans and the man himself. So why is Sora seeing him now?

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Xigbar
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: One of Organization XIII's members. As Number II, he has Xehanort's trust above all others. His job this time has been to vex Sora and lead him further into the abyss of sleep.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Xion
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Organization XIII's mysterious fourteenth member. She was an experimental replica used to "catch" Roxas's memories and create a Keyblade wielder for the Organization. In the end, she was erased from existence and returned to Sora where she belonged.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Yen Sid
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: A great sorcerer who watches over the balance between light and darkness. He was also King Mickey's teacher. With a new threat looming ever closer, he has decided Sora and Riku must be examined for the Mark of Mastery.

Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Title: Young Xehanort
Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance.Description: Xehanort in his early years. He has traveled through time to guide Sora toward a ghastly fate.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Aced
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: One of the Master's disciples who receives a copy of the Book of Prophecies. He is a fearless Keyblade Master and leader of the Union Ursus. Though he tends to rely on his physical prowess, he has a pure heart and strong sense of justice. His role is to support their new leader, Ira.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Ava
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: One of the Master's disciples who receives a copy of the Book of Prophecies. Despite being a Keyblade Master, she is often treated as a friend by other wielders due to her age. She is the leader of the Union Vulpes. Her role is to find exceptional Keyblade wielders regardless of Union and create her own organization.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Chirithy
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: Created by the Master to serve the Keyblade wielders. They originally exist as helpful Spirits. If their wielder becomes lost to darkness, however, they turn black and become Nightmares.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Ephemer
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: A young and outgoing Keyblade wielder. He questions the way the world works and decides to solve its mysteries on his own.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Gula
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: One of the Master's disciples who receives a copy of the Book of Prophecies. He is a coolheaded Keyblade Master and leader of the Union Leopardus. He prefers to keep his distance from the others and doesn't regard them as comrades. His role is to solve the mysteries of the Book of Prophecies.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Invi
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: One of the Master's disciples who receives a copy of the Book of Prophecies. She is a virtuous Keyblade Master and leader of the Union Anguis. She holds the Master in high esteem. Her role is to watch over the others with a fair eye.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Ira
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: One of the Master's disciples who receives a copy of the Book of Prophecies. He is a reliable Keyblade Master and leader of the Union Unicornis. The Master often makes fun of his serious nature. His role is to become the new leader of the foretellers after the Master vanishes.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Luxu
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: The only one of the Master's disciples who does not receive a copy of the Book of Prophecies. He is bestowed with a Keyblade and a black box before setting out on his journey.

Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Title: Master of Masters
Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover.Description: A mysterious man who possesses an eye that can see into the future. He uses that knowledge to write the Book of Prophecies. No one knows whether his mischievous nature is calculated or true. He disappears after bestowing five of his six apprentices with a copy of the Book.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Aeleus
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The human form of Lexaeus, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. Before joining the Organization, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and guarded the castle together with Dilan.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Aced
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the ancient Keyblade Masters. A stalwart young man who dons a white robe and a bear mask.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Anna
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Elsa's younger sister. A random encounter brought her and Kristoff together, and together they pledged to end the unnatural winter plaguing Arendelle.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ansem
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of the real Organization XIII. This is Xehanort's Heartless. He was able to regain his original appearance by possessing Riku. In the past, Ansem attempted to open the door to Kingdom Hearts, but was destroyed by Sora and friends before he could succeed. Despite this, Ansem has returned.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ansem the Wise
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The sage king who once ruled over Radiant Garden. After his apprentices stole his research into the heart, he assumed a new name: DiZ, or "Darkness in Zero." Consumed by vengeance, he ruined more lives than one. In time, he saw the error of his ways, but in a last-ditch attempt to thwart the old Organization's plans, he was obliterated from the realm of light.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Anti-Aqua
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Aqua, after she fell to darkness. Years and years of wandering through the realm of darkness ended with her being cast into the watery depths beyond its margin.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Apollo
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the gods of Olympus.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Aqua
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of three Keyblade wielders who trained under Master Eraqus. Following the battle over the χ-blade more than a decade ago, she braved the realm of darkness to save a friend, and was trapped inside alone. After losing her Keyblade, she was unable to fight back the forces of the dark and was cast into the abyss below.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ariel
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A friend that answered Sora's call through the power of the Heartbinder.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Athena
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the goddesses of Olympus.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Baymax
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of Big Hero 6. He was originally a healthcare robot developed by Hiro's older brother, Tadashi, but with the addition of combat data and an armored suit, Hiro upgraded him to "Baymax 2.0."

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Boo
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A brave little human girl with boundless curiosity. She enjoys playing with Mike and Sulley on her occasional visits to Monsters, Incorporated.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: The Boy in Black
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: He and his best friend would often match wits playing chess between training sessions.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: The Boy in White
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: He and his best friend would often match wits playing chess between training sessions.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Buzz Lightyear
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A newer addition to Andy's toy lineup: an action figure who at one point believed he was a real, actual space ranger. Buzz reluctantly agreed to leave Andy's room and investigate Galaxy Toys.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: CDA Agent
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of an agency originally established to ensure no contaminants from human children accidentally cross over. The CDA sprang into action to aid Monsters, Incorporated in its time of crisis.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Chip
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of Disney Castle's engineers. Serious and professional, his skills with machinery are top class. He invented the gummi ship and Gummiphone together with his younger brother Dale.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Chirithy
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A curious creature that begrudgingly offered Sora its assistance in The Final World.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Cutler Beckett
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Governor of the East India Trading Company. He took to the sea in order to eradicate all pirates and claim control of the waters for himself.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Daisy Duck
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Donald's girlfriend. She is assisting Queen Minnie with royal affairs until the King returns.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Dale
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of Disney Castle's engineers. Despite his laid-back personality, his skills with machinery are top class. He invented the gummi ship and Gummiphone together with his older brother Chip.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Dark Baymax
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The original Baymax. He was retrieved from anther dimension in a mantle of Darkubes, his program chip loaded with data from the hearts of the people the Darkubes attacked.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Dark Riku
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of the real Organization XIII. He looks exactly like Riku, except a year younger, and he wears the Organization's black coat.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Davy Jones
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Captain of the Flying Dutchman. When Jack violated their agreement, Jones sent the Kraken after him.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Demyx
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A reserve member of the real Organization XIII. Despite his destruction at Sora's hands, Demyx has returned. He spends most of his time tuning his sitar, and his demeanor makes it extremely difficult to believe he's part of anything untoward.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Dewey
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of Donald's triplet nephews, known for his trademark blue cap. He runs a gummi block shop together with his brothers.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Dilan
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The human form of Xaldin, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. Before joining the Organization, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and guarded the castle together with Aeleus.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Donald Duck
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: King Mickey's court magician and a loyal friend. Donald has journeyed with Sora many times to keep the worlds safe. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Donald Duck (The Caribbean)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: King Mickey's court magician and a loyal friend. Donald has journeyed with Sora many times to keep the worlds safe. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Donald assumes when visiting Jack's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Donald Duck (Monstropolis)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: King Mickey's court magician and a loyal friend. Donald has journeyed with Sora many times to keep the worlds safe. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Donald assumes when visiting Sulley and Mike's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Donald Duck (Toy Box)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: King Mickey's court magician and a loyal friend. Donald has journeyed with Sora many times to keep the worlds safe. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Donald assumes when visiting Woody and Buzz's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Elizabeth Swann
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Daughter to the governor of Port Royal, and a friend of Jack's. We know Elizabeth from our past adventures. We were reunited with Elizabeth as she and the others came to rescue Jack from Davy Jones' Locker.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Pirates: Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Elsa I
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Arendelle's queen and a wielder of powerful ice magic unlike any we've seen. We saw her leave her old home behind and run up the North Mountain.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Elsa II
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Arendelle's queen and a wielder of powerful ice magic unlike any we've seen. We saw her leave her old home behind and run up the North Mountain. Anna's older sister. A quarrel with Anna on her coronation day resulted in Elsa unleashing the ice magic she'd been keeping hidden, and Elsa fled the castle.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ephemer
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A mysterious boy who reached out to Sora's heart in a moment of crisis.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Flynn Rider I
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A young man who showed up with the Heartless hot on his heels. It seems they aren't the only ones he was running from. He discovered Rapunzel's tower while on the run and felt compelled to climb it. After meeting the girl inside, he agreed to serve as her guide.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Flynn Rider II
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A young man who showed up with the Heartless hot on his heels. It seems they aren't the only ones he was running from. He discovered Rapunzel's tower while on the run and felt compelled to climb it. After meeting the girl inside, he agreed to serve as her guide. Flynn, as it turns out, isn't his real name. He took the alias from The Tales of Flynnigan Rider, a book of stories about a swashbuckling rogue. Meeting Rapunzel prompted a change of heart, however, and now he goes by his real name, Eugene Fitzherbert.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Fred
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Tadashi's college friend, and a member of Big Hero 6. While not technically a student, Fred is a familiar face around campus. His suit is a kaiju costume heavily influenced by his personal tastes.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Go Go Tomago
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Tadashi's college friend, and a member of Big Hero 6. Go Go's suit functionality centers around a unique electromagnetic suspension system.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Goofy
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The captain of King Mickey's royal knights and also a good friend. Goofy has stuck by Sora's side through more than one adventure. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Goofy (The Caribbean)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The captain of King Mickey's royal knights and also a good friend. Goofy has stuck by Sora's side through more than one adventure. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Goofy assumes when visiting Jack's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Goofy (Monstropolis)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The captain of King Mickey's royal knights and also a good friend. Goofy has stuck by Sora's side through more than one adventure. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Goofy assumes when visiting Sulley and Mike's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Goofy (Toy Box)
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The captain of King Mickey's royal knights and also a good friend. Goofy has stuck by Sora's side through more than one adventure. He has pledged to help Sora through the trials ahead. This is the guise Goofy assumes when visiting Woody and Buzz's world.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Gopher
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A hard worker who lives in the Hundred Acre Wood. He's an expert digger, and can usually be found either burrowing a hole or falling into one.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree (1966)

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Green Army Men
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: An army in a bucket, equipped with an array of gear that enables them to perform a broad range of missions.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Gula
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the ancient Keyblade Masters. A coldly objective young man who dons a white robe and a leopard mask.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hades
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: God of the Underworld. Undaunted by all the losses he suffered at Hercules' hands, he revived the Titans and tried to use them to overthrow Zeus and chaim Olympus as his own.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hamm
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Andy's piggy bank. His belly, full of loose change, tends to slow him down when the call to action comes. Unlike Rex, he's more of a Gigas fan.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hans
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A young man we saw taking Elsa away from the ice palace. Darkness seemed to have a hold on him.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hayner
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: An unruly boy who lives in Twilight Town. He hangs out with Pence and Olette, and feels an uncanny bond with Roxas. We know Hayner from our past adventures.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hector Barbossa
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A pirate captain who was cursed never to die and once caused us plenty of trouble. He was freed of the curse's bonds and mortal again just in time to be run through by Jack. However, Tia Dalma revived him, and the others came to rescue Jack from Davy Jones' Locker.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Pirates: Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hercules
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A hero with a kind heart and tremendous strength. He was born a god, but lives down on earth as a mortal. We know Herc very well from the adventures we've shared together.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hermes
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the gods of Olympus.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Hiro Hamada
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A boy genius living in San Fransokyo, and a member of Big Hero 6. After Hiro presented the microbots he invented, events took a turn for the tragic and he lost his brother, Tadashi. Together with Tadashi's friends and his brother's robot, Baymax, Hiro got to the bottom of the incident, and now the team continues to keep the peace as Big Hero 6.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Honey Lemon
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Tadashi's college friend, and a member of Big Hero 6. Honey Lemon's special purse allows her to quickly create "chem-balls" containing a variety of unique chemical compounds.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Huey
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of Donald's triplet nephews, known for his trademark red cap. He runs a gummi block shop together with his brothers.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ice Titan
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A gargantuan being made of frigid ice.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ienzo
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The human form of Zexion, one of Organization XIII's Nobodies. Before joining the Organization, he was one of Ansem the Wise's apprentices and researched the mysteries of the heart. He is now hard at work deciphering Ansem's Code.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Invi
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the ancient Keyblade Masters. A genteel young woman who dons a white robe and a snake mask.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Ira
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of the ancient Keyblade Masters. A judicious young man who dons a white robe and a unicorn mask.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Jack Sparrow
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A legendary pirate, and captain of the Black Pearl. We know Jack well from our past adventures. After we parted ways, Jack was devoured by the Kraken and sent to Davy Jones' Locker, where our paths crossed again.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Pirates: Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Jiminy Cricket
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Hello, worlds! Cricket's the name - Jiminy Cricket. I'll be tagging along with Sora and the others, chronicling every moment of our grand adventure. It's good to be back!

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Joshamee Gibbs
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of the Black Pearl's crew. He and Jack get along swimmingly, and one is rarely more than a stone's throw away from the other. We met Gibbs as he and the others came to rescue Jack from Davy Jones' locker.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Pirates: Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Kairi
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Sora and Riku's childhood friend. As one of the seven princesses of heart, she became a target of the forces of darkness, but thankfully Sora and Riku came to the rescue. She now trains with Lea as a Keyblade wielder herself to prepare for the final battle ahead.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Kristoff
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A young iceman who is never apart from his reindeer friend, Sven. A random encounter brought him and Anna together, and together they pledged to end the unnatural winter plaguing Arendelle.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Larxene
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of the real Organization XIII. Despite her destruction at Sora's hands, Larxene has returned to keep tabs on the "New Seven Hearts," whom the Organization may need should their original plan go awry.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Lava Titan
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A gargantuan being made of molten lava.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Lea
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A Keyblade wielder who was once a Nobody and member of Organization XIII, at which time he went by the name "Axel." After regaining his humanity, Lea joined forces with Sora and the other guardians of light. Through difficult training, he learned to summon and wield a Keyblade.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Lingering Will
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A suit of armor imbued with Terra's thoughts and wishes.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Little Chef
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The chef of a well-reviewed restaurant. After meeting Scrooge, he was encouraged to come to Twilight Town to open a bistro, where he has been using ingredients from other worlds to further his culinary talents.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Little Green Men
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: An identical trio that were prizes from the Pizza Planet crane game. They tend to stick together.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Louie
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: One of Donald's triplet nephews, known for his trademark green cap. He runs a gummi block shop together with his brothers.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Lumpy
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A young heffalump who lives near the edge of the Hundred Acre Wood. After he met Roo and the two became good friends, Lumpy comes by to visit and play all the time.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Luxord
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A member of the real Organization XIII. He is a lover of games, and sometimes even prioritizes them over his Organization duties. Despite his destruction at Sora's hands, Luxord has returned.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Maleficent
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: An evil fairy who seeks to rule over all worlds. She and Pete are searching for a black box.
Kingdom Hearts III.AdditionalInformation: Despite his destruction at Sora's hands, Marluxia has returned to keep tabs on the "New Seven Hearts," whom the Organization may need should their original plan go awry.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Marluxia
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: Despite his destruction at Sora's hands, Marluxia has returned to keep tabs on the "New Seven Hearts," whom the Organization may need should their original plan go awry.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Marshmallow
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A fearsome sentinel that protects Elsa. He was created by her magic.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Master Eraqus
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The true Keyblade Master who mentored Terra, Aqua, and Ventus. He was struck down by his own brother-in-training, Master Xehanort, in the clash over a decade ago.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Master of Masters
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A mysterious figure shrouded in a hooded black coat. Aside from his claim that he is one of the Lost Masters, not much else is known about him.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Master Xehanort
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The most powerful Keyblade Master of them all. Master Xehanort's pursuit of the World's true nature and obsession with the Keyblade War led him to give his heart over to darkness. He tried to forge the χ-blade and trigger another Keyblade War, but three young Keyblade wielders put a stop to him. Now, he has created a new Organization - the real Organization XIII - and intends to divide his heart among its other twelve members to create thirteen darknesses.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Maximus
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: The proud, white steed belonging to the captain of the royal guards. Maximus was chasing after Flynn, but begrudgingly agreed to work with him at Rapunzel's request.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Megara
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A woman dear to Hercules' heart. In the past, Hades blackmailed her into doing his bidding, but meeting Hercules put an end to that dark chapter of her life.

Kingdom Hearts III.Title: Merlin
Kingdom Hearts III.Description: A great wizard able to manipulate time itself.
